trans-unit.source: Provides access to the property values of a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern"></xref> object using its <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Current"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Cached"></xref> accessors.
Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> set to `false` prior to the creation of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> object.
`true` if the value is read-only; `false` if it can be modified.
The default is `true`.
Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value"></xref> property.
The large-change value or `null` if the element does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange"></xref>.
The default value is 0.0.
Gets the maximum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

The maximum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or `null` if the element does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum"></xref>.
The default value is 0.0.
Gets the minimum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

The minimum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or `null` if the element does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum"></xref>.
The default value is 0.0.

Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value"></xref> property.

The small-change value unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or `null` if the element does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange"></xref>.
The default value is 0.0.
Gets the current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

The current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or `null` if the element does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value"></xref>.
The default value is 0.0.
